classifiers: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
afanimation
===========

Overview
========

Description
-----------

This is a simple python loading animation including funny expression.
You can make people waiting completion of tasks less bored.

Requirement
-----------

-  Module

   -  enum

-  Environment
-  Python 2.7 or above.

Usage
-----

::

    import afanimation
    a = afanimation.Animation()
    a.start()
    ....Some loading tasks....
    a.stop()

Install
-------

pip install afanimation

Licence
-------

MIT

Author
------

[Aoi Fukuoka] (https://github.com/aoifukuoka)
